Name: Fragment of architrave of Khetety
Description: The preserved part of the architrave shows three horizontal lines of inscription, the second and third ending to the left before a representation of a couple. Underneath the third line, the four sons of the couple are depicted as offering-bearers. The lower edge has a narrow elevated register line for the figures to stand on. The three lines contain the name and titles of Khetety and a prayer for mercy.
